verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> when [there was] no king אֵ֣ין <WH369> there בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> that there was a certain לֵוִ֗י <WH3881> Levite גָּ֚ר <WH1481> sojourning בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> on the side הַר־ <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> who took לוֹ֙ אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> ess פִילֶ֔גֶשׁ <WH6370> A concubine מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַתִּזְנֶ֤ה <WH2181> played the whore עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against פִּֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6370> And his concubine וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went מֵֽאִתּוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔יהָ <WH1> from him unto her father's אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֕ם <WH8033> was there יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> A period אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> and was there four חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> months

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> arose אִישָׁ֜הּ <WH376> And her husband וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ <WH310> after לְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> her to speak עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבָּהּ֙ <WH3820> friendly [לַהֲשִׁיבֹו כ] (לַהֲשִׁיבָ֔הּ <WH7725> break ק) וְנַעֲר֥וֹ <WH5288> having his servant עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> and a וְצֶ֣מֶד <WH6776> with him and a couple חֲמֹרִ֑ים <WH2543> of asses וַתְּבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> and she brought בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔יהָ <WH1> him into her father's וַיִּרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7200> saw אֲבִ֣י <WH1> and when the father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> of the damsel וַיִּשְׂמַ֖ח <WH8055> him he rejoiced לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <WH7125> to meet

וַיֶּחֱזַק־ <WH2388> retained בּ֤וֹ חֹֽתְנוֹ֙ <WH2859> And his father in law אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <WH5291> the damsel's וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> him and he abode אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> with him three יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וַיֹּאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> so they did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> and drink וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> and lodged שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> And it came to pass on the fourth וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ימוּ <WH7925> when they arose early בַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> that he rose up לָלֶ֑כֶת <WH1980> to go וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אֲבִ֨י <WH1> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֜ה <WH5291> and the damsel's אֶל־ <WH413> to his חֲתָנ֗וֹ <WH2860> unto his son in law סְעָ֧ד <WH5582> Comfort לִבְּךָ֛ <WH3820> thine heart פַּת־ <WH6595> with a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְאַחַ֥ר <WH310> and afterward תֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> may go

וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> And they sat down וַיֹּאכְל֧וּ <WH398> and did eat שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH8147> both יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> of them together וַיִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> and drink וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> had said אֲבִ֤י <WH1> father הַֽנַּעֲרָה֙ <WH5291> for the damsel's אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הֽוֹאֶל־ <WH2974> Be content נָ֥א <WH4994> Please וְלִ֖ין <WH3885> I pray thee and tarry all night וְיִטַ֥ב <WH3190> be merry לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> and let thine heart

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> rose up הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> And when the man לָלֶ֑כֶת <WH1980> to go וַיִּפְצַר־ <WH6484> urged בּוֹ֙ חֹתְנ֔וֹ <WH2859> his father in law וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> there again וַיָּ֥לֶן <WH3885> him therefore he lodged שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> And he arose early בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <WH1242> in the morning בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַחֲמִישִׁי֮ <WH2549> on the fifth לָלֶכֶת֒ <WH1980> to go וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> said אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ה <WH5291> and the damsel's סְעָד־ <WH5582> Comfort נָא֙ <WH4994> Please לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> thine heart וְהִֽתְמַהְמְה֖וּ <WH4102> I pray thee And they tarried עַד־ <WH5704> until נְט֣וֹת <WH5186> afternoon הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> day וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> and they did eat שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> both

וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> rose up הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And when the man לָלֶ֔כֶת <WH1980> that thou mayest go ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <WH6370> he and his concubine וְנַעֲר֑וֹ <WH5288> and his servant וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ חֹתְנ֣וֹ <WH2859> his father in law אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֡ה <WH5291> the damsel's הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold נָא֩ <WH4994> now רָפָ֨ה <WH7503> draweth הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> unto him Behold now the day לַעֲרֹ֗ב <WH6150> toward evening לִֽינוּ־ <WH3885> I pray you tarry all night נָ֞א <WH4994> please הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Lo חֲנ֤וֹת <WH2583> groweth to an end הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> behold the day לִ֥ין <WH3885> lodge פֹּה֙ <WH6311> here וְיִיטַ֣ב <WH3190> may be merry לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> here that thine heart וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֤ם <WH7925> get you early מָחָר֙ <WH4279> and to morrow לְדַרְכְּכֶ֔ם <WH1870> on your way וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <WH1980> you may go לְאֹהָלֶֽךָ׃ <WH168> home

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֤ה <WH14> would הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> But the man לָל֔וּן <WH3885> not tarry that night וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> but he rose up וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> and departed וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> to נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> over against יְב֔וּס <WH2982> Jebus הִ֖יא <WH1931> he יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> which [is] Jerusalem וְעִמּ֗וֹ <WH5973> with צֶ֤מֶד <WH6776> and [there were] with him two חֲמוֹרִים֙ <WH2543> asses חֲבוּשִׁ֔ים <WH2280> saddled וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <WH6370> his concubine עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

הֵ֣ם <WH1992> When עִם־ <WH5973> they near יְב֔וּס <WH2982> [And] when they [were] by Jebus וְהַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> the day רַ֣ד <WH7286> spent מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> was far וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַנַּ֜עַר <WH5288> and the servant אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֲדֹנָ֗יו <WH113> unto his master לְכָה־ <WH1980> come נָּ֛א <WH4994> Please וְנָס֛וּרָה <WH5493> I pray thee and let us turn in אֶל־ <WH413> about עִֽיר־ <WH5892> into this city הַיְבוּסִ֥י <WH2983> of the Jebusites הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise וְנָלִ֥ין <WH3885> and lodge בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> And his master לֹ֤א <WH3808> We will not נָסוּר֙ <WH5493> unto him We will not turn aside אֶל־ <WH413> into עִ֣יר <WH5892> hither into the city נָכְרִ֔י <WH5237> of a stranger אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> that [is] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here וְעָבַ֖רְנוּ <WH5674> we will pass over עַד־ <WH5704> far גִּבְעָֽה׃ <WH1390> to Gibeah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> unto his servant לְךָ֥ <WH1980> Come וְנִקְרְבָ֖ה <WH7126> and let us draw near בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> to one הַמְּקֹמ֑וֹת <WH4725> of these places וְלַ֥נּוּ <WH3885> to lodge all night בַגִּבְעָ֖ה <WH1390> in Gibeah א֥וֹ <WH176> or בָרָמָֽה׃ <WH7414> or in Ramah

וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <WH5674> And they passed on וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> and went וַתָּבֹ֤א <WH935> went down לָהֶם֙ הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> and the sun אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> upon them [when they were] by הַגִּבְעָ֖ה <WH1390> Gibeah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> which [belongeth] to Benjamin

וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <WH5493> And they turned aside שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there לָב֖וֹא <WH935> thither to go in לָל֣וּן <WH3885> [and] to lodge בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> in Gibeah וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> and when he went in וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> he sat him down בִּרְח֣וֹב <WH7339> in a street הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> for [there was] no man מְאַסֵּֽף־ <WH622> that took אוֹתָ֥ם <WH853> הַבַּ֖יְתָה <WH1004> them into his house לָלֽוּן׃ <WH3885> to lodging

וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> behold אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man זָקֵ֗ן <WH2205> an old בָּ֣א <WH935> And behold there came מִֽן־ <WH4480> from מַעֲשֵׂ֤הוּ <WH4639> from his work מִן־ <WH4480> out הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> out of the field בָּעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> at even וְהָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> which [was] also מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim וְהוּא־ <WH1931> and he גָ֖ר <WH1481> and he sojourned בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> in Gibeah וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of the place בְּנֵ֥י יְמִינִֽי׃ <WH1145> [were] Benjamites

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> And when he had lifted up עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֛רְא <WH7200> he saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man הָאֹרֵ֖חַ <WH732> a wayfaring בִּרְחֹ֣ב <WH7339> in the street הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> man הַזָּקֵ֛ן <WH2205> and the old אָ֥נָה <WH575> Where תֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> going וּמֵאַ֥יִן <WH370> thou? and whence תָּבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> comest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him עֹבְרִ֨ים <WH5674> unto him We [are] passing אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves מִבֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <WH1035> Bethlehem יְהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> Judah עַד־ <WH5704> against יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> toward the side הַר־ <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרַיִם֒ <WH669> Ephraim מִשָּׁ֣ם <WH8033> there אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> and I וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <WH1980> but I [am now] going עַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> going וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and no אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> and there [is] no man מְאַסֵּ֥ף <WH622> that receiveth אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> me to house

וְגַם־ <WH1571> is both תֶּ֤בֶן <WH8401> both straw גַּם־ <WH1571> and also מִסְפּוֹא֙ <WH4554> and provender יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> Yet there is לַחֲמוֹרֵ֔ינוּ <WH2543> for our asses וְ֠גַם <WH1571> is both לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> and there is bread וָיַ֤יִן <WH3196> and wine יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> there לִי֙ וְלַֽאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> also for me and for thy handmaid וְלַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and for the young man עִם־ <WH5973> is with עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> [which is] with thy servants אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַחְס֖וֹר <WH4270> [there is] no want כָּל־ <WH3605> of any דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> of any thing

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man הַזָּקֵן֙ <WH2205> And the old שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> Peace לָ֔ךְ רַ֥ק <WH7535> [be] with thee howsoever כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַחְסוֹרְךָ֖ <WH4270> [let] all thy wants עָלָ֑י <WH5921> and רַ֥ק <WH7535> in בָּרְח֖וֹב <WH7339> not in the street אַל־ <WH408> not תָּלַֽן׃ <WH3885> [lie] upon me only lodge

וַיְבִיאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> So he brought לְבֵית֔וֹ <WH1004> him into his house [וַיִּבֹּול כ] (וַיָּ֖בָל <WH1101> anoint ק) לַחֲמוֹרִ֑ים <WH2543> unto the asses וַֽיִּרְחֲצוּ֙ <WH7364> and they washed רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> their feet וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> and drink

הֵמָּה֮ <WH1992> like מֵיטִיבִ֣ים <WH3190> merry אֶת־ <WH853> לִבָּם֒ <WH3820> [Now] as they were making their hearts וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> man הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> of the city אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the man בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons בְלִיַּ֗עַל <WH1100> of Belial נָסַ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> round about אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house מִֽתְדַּפְּקִ֖ים <WH1849> [and] beat עַל־ <WH5921> and הַדָּ֑לֶת <WH1817> at the door וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> about הָ֠אִישׁ <WH376> man בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> to the master הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> of the house הַזָּקֵן֙ <WH2205> the old לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הוֹצֵ֗א <WH3318> Bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֥א <WH935> that came אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> into thine house וְנֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3045> that we may know

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> then הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And the man בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> the master הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> unto them and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to אַל־ <WH408> unto them Nay אַחַ֖י <WH251> my brethren אַל־ <WH408> No תָּרֵ֣עוּ <WH7489> [nay] I pray you do not [so] wickedly נָ֑א <WH4994> please אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> seeing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֞א <WH935> is come הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> that this man הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אַל־ <WH413> into בֵּיתִ֔י <WH1004> into mine house אַֽל־ <WH408> No תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> do אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <WH5039> not this folly הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Here בִתִּ֨י <WH1323> Behold [here is] my daughter הַבְּתוּלָ֜ה <WH1330> a maiden וּפִֽילַגְשֵׁ֗הוּ <WH6370> and his concubine אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <WH3318> them I will bring out נָּ֤א <WH4994> Please אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> וְעַנּ֣וּ <WH6031> now and humble אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> ye them and do לָהֶ֔ם הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> with them what seemeth וְלָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> unto you but unto this man הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> such לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> do דְּבַ֖ר <WH1697> a thing הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <WH5039> vile הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> not so

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָב֤וּ <WH14> would הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> But the men לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <WH8085> not hearken ל֔וֹ וַיַּחֲזֵ֤ק <WH2388> took הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> to him so the man בְּפִ֣ילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6370> his concubine וַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> and brought אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about הַח֑וּץ <WH2351> her forth וַיֵּדְע֣וּ <WH3045> unto them and they knew א֠וֹתָהּ <WH853> וַיִּֽתְעַלְּלוּ־ <WH5953> her and abused בָ֤הּ כָּל־ <WH3605> her all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> her all the night עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> until the morning וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּהָ <WH7971> they let her go [בַּעֲלֹות כ] (כַּעֲלֹ֥ות <WH5927> arise ק) הַשָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> and when the day

וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> Then came הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> the woman לִפְנ֣וֹת <WH6437> in the dawning הַבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> of the day וַתִּפֹּ֞ל <WH5307> and fell down פֶּ֧תַח <WH6607> at the door בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> of the man's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אֲדוֹנֶ֥יהָ <WH113> where her lord שָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it עַד־ <WH5704> was until הָאֽוֹר׃ <WH216> [was] till it was light

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> rose up אֲדֹנֶ֜יהָ <WH113> And her lord בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּפְתַּח֙ <WH6605> and opened דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> the doors הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and went out לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to go לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> behold הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> and behold the woman פִֽילַגְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6370> his concubine נֹפֶ֙לֶת֙ <WH5307> was fallen down פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> [at] the door הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וְיָדֶ֖יהָ <WH3027> and her hands עַל־ <WH5921> on הַסַּֽף׃ <WH5592> [were] upon the threshold

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> to her ק֥וּמִי <WH6965> unto her Up וְנֵלֵ֖כָה <WH1980> go וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there עֹנֶ֑ה <WH6030> But none answered וַיִּקָּחֶ֙הָ֙ <WH3947> took עַֽל־ <WH5921> her on הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> her [up] upon an ass וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> Then the man וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> him unto his place

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> And when he was come אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית֗וֹ <WH1004> into his house וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> he took אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֙לֶת֙ <WH3979> a knife וַיַּחֲזֵ֣ק <WH2388> and laid hold בְּפִֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6370> on his concubine וַֽיְנַתְּחֶ֙הָ֙ <WH5408> and divided לַעֲצָמֶ֔יהָ <WH6106> her [together] with her bones לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten נְתָחִ֑ים <WH5409> pieces וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֔הָ <WH7971> and sent בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> her throughout גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> her into all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> And it was so כָל־ <WH3605> All הָרֹאֶ֗ה <WH7200> that all that saw וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> it said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nothing נִהְיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> has happened וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nothing נִרְאֲתָה֙ <WH7200> done nor seen כָּזֹ֔את <WH2063> There was no such deed לְמִיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> from the day עֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> came up בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this שִֽׂימוּ־ <WH7760> consider לָכֶ֥ם עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and עֻ֥צוּ <WH5779> of it take advice וְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> and speak פ
